name: hhssmet
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: -| wceq(c2, cop(cop(cres(cva, cxp(c1, c1)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c1))), cres(cno, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1))
-| wcel(c2, cnv)
-| wi(wcel(c2, cnv), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈(Met ` c1)
⊣ c2 ∈ NrmCVec
⊣ (c2 ∈ NrmCVec → c0 ∈(Met ` c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1))
-| wcel(c2, cnv)
-| wi(wcel(c2, cnv), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈(Met ` c1)
⊣ c2 ∈ NrmCVec
⊣ (c2 ∈ NrmCVec → c0 ∈(Met ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wcel(c2, cnv)
-| wceq(c2, cop(cop(cres(cva, cxp(c1, c1)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c1))), cres(cno, c1)))
-| wcel(c1, csh)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cnv), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, cop(cop(cres(cva, cxp(c1, c1)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c1))), cres(cno, c1)))
-| wcel(c1, csh)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c2, cnv), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cba, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cims, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c2 ∈ NrmCVec → c0 ∈(Met ` c1))
⊣ c1 =(BaseSet ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(IndMet ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cop(cop(cres(cva, cxp(c1, c1)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c1))), cres(cno, c1)))
-| wcel(c1, csh)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cba, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cims, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈(Met ` c1)
⊣ c2 = < <(+h |`(c1 × c1)),(.h |`(ℂ × c1))>,(normh |` c1)>
⊣ c1 ∈ SH
⊣ c1 =(BaseSet ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(IndMet ` c2)

body.origin:
|- wceq(c1, cfv(cba, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cop(cop(cres(cva, cxp(c1, c1)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c1))), cres(cno, c1)))
-| wcel(c1, csh)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cop(cop(cres(cva, cxp(c1, c1)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c1))), cres(cno, c1)))
-| wcel(c1, csh)
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cims, c2))

comment: Induced metric of a subspace. (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
